situation: A construction crane is badly needed by Cruz Esguera Construction for a certain project so as to shorten the time of completion of the project. The equipment costs P1.2 M and has a life of 5 years with a salvage value of P200,000 at the end of its life. The machine can be bought with money borrowed at an interest rate of 20% per annum. Annual operating cost is P10,000. Determine the capitalized cost of this equipment.
